Acceldata Torch is a complete solution to observe the quality of the data present in your data lake and warehouse.
Using Torch, you can ensure that high-quality data backs your business decisions.
Torch provides you with tools to measure the quality of data in a data catalog and to never miss significant data sources.
All users including analysts, data scientists, and developers, can rely on Torch to observe the data flowing
in the warehouse or data lake and can rest assured that there is no loss of data.
